page.title: Become a Driver
page.body:
You don't seem to find a good trip?
You want to go somewhere at a reduced cost?

Don't worry, we got you covered!
Become a driver and plan your next trips!

page.title: Send us your driver's license
page.body: To become a driver, we first need proof you can legally drive. Send us your driving license and our team will get back at you in 1-2 days.
page.message: We only keep your documents in our server while making the verification process.
